thread.title: Corbyn is a clown and May should retire - the thoughts of Devon traveller John Treagood | Devon Live

title: Corbyn is a clown and May should retire - the thoughts of Devon traveller John Treagood | Devon Live
text:
Corbyn is a clown and May should retire - the thoughts of Devon traveller John Treagood By Lewis_Clarke | Posted: June 15, 2017 4 COMMENTS SHARES Comments (4) 
Devon Traveller John Treagood has given his views on the current political landscape in Great Britain following the General Election last week. 
Mr Treagood, 81, is currently located between Cullompton and Bradninch on his way to Exeter.He said he had been keeping abreast of what is happening in the world in the Daily Mail â€“ and definitely not The Guardian. 
Last week, Theresa May - who at the time the election was called was hoping to increase her majority - lost her Commons majority as Labour made gains across the country. 
"I've got no time for politicians, they're all idiots," he said. 
Mr Treagood suggested that it may be time for Theresa May to retire, and referred to Jeremy Corbyn as a clown. 
"There's too many parties aren't there. We should be like the Americans and just have two. All these people sitting in Parliament getting all that money, and half of them never speak. It's the same with the House of Lords. 
"It's all got out of hand, they're all in it for the money." 
Mr Treagood added that all he was worried about now was "getting out of bloody Europe." 
"I never did like the idea of being part of Europe and I'm not going to change my mind now. I don't know what all this hard and soft Brexit is all about, just go to them and say we're going to leave and then leave." 
John, 81, is known to many across the South West region after spending more than 40 years after leaving the army travelling with his horse and cart and stopping at various roadsides on his way around the area. 
A worldwide funding appeal in 2015 saw enough money raised for John to buy new horse Misty after Gildor, his horse of 18 years, died Read More
